config.immersive_telephones.title: Immersive Telephones Config
tooltip.config.immersive_telephones.fanc:
Makes the handset cord curly,
but uses many more polygons
tooltip.config.immersive_telephones.accu:
Experimental method of connecting the phone cord
to the handset in the player's hand
tooltip.config.immersive_telephones.hand: When holding a handset, players hold it to their head
tooltip.config.immersive_telephones.maxH:
Maximum distance players can bring the handset
before it is yanked out of their hand
block.immersive_telephones.speaker: Speaker
